cards.rules_text: Reveal the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand, then target opponent may have you put the other on the bottom of your library. [i](Otherwise put it back on top.)[/i]
Draw a card.

Put target spell on top of its owner’s library.
Each player conjures a card named Fatigue and puts it on top of their library. [i](It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)[/i]

Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
Conjure a card named Fatigue and put it on top of your library. [i](It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)[/i]

Draw two cards.
Conjure a card named Fatigue and put it on top of your library. [i](It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)[/i]

Choose one —
• Radiant Outburst deals 3 damage to target creature.
• Harmonize twice. [i](To harmonize, trigger up to one harmony of a permanent you control.)[/i]

{T}: Add {C}.
Tap three differently named untapped Academies you control: Draw a card.

{T}: Add {C}.
Tap three differently named untapped Academies you control: Put a +1/+1 counter on target permanent. Activate only as a sorcery.

{T}: Add {C}. If Soaring Observatory entered this turn, add one mana of any color instead.
Tap three differently named untapped Academies you control: Add three mana in any combination of colors.

Archive 3 [i](As this enters, shuffle the top three cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)[/i]
Whenever you draw a card from the archived library, put the top card of your main library on the bottom of the archived library.
{W}: Exchange a card from the archived library with a card from your hand.

Archive 3 [i](As this enters, shuffle the top three cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)[/i]
Whenever you draw a card from the archived library, put the top card of your main library on the bottom of the archived library.
{G}: Exchange a card from the archived library with a card from your hand.

Choose two or four —
• Prove Worthy has lifelink and can’t be countered.
• Prove Worthy deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.
• Prove Worthy deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
• Conjure a card named Fatigue and put it on top of your library. [i](It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)[/i]

When Dance of Steel and Song enters, rouse 2. [i](Distribute two +1/+1 counters among permanents you control. If they aren’t creatures, tap them and they become 0/0 creatures in addition to their other types.)[/i]
Artifact creatures and enchantment creatures you control get +1/+1.

When Patient Herbology enters, rouse 2. [i](Distribute two +1/+1 counters among permanents you control. If they aren’t creatures, tap them and they become 0/0 creatures in addition to their other types.)[/i]
Sacrifice Patient Herbology: Untap target land. You gain 2 life.

When you cast this spell, copy it for each color of mana spent to cast it beyond the first.
Flying

Rouse 1. Target permanent gains first strike until end of turn if it’s a creature. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on a permanent you control. If it isn’t a creature, tap it and it becomes a 0/0 creature in addition to its other types.)[/i]

When Somnambulance enters, each player conjures a card named Fatigue and puts it on top of their library. [i](It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)[/i]
Whenever a player casts a spell named Fatigue, you may draw a card. If you do, you lose 1 life.

Whenever Strict Instructor attacks, harmonize. [i](Trigger up to one harmony of a permanent you control.)[/i]
Harmony — Tap or untap another target permanent.

Whenever Illumination Savant attacks, harmonize. [i](Trigger up to one harmony of a permanent you control.)[/i]
Harmony — Put a +1/+1 counter on each artifact creature and enchantment creature you control.

You may cast Oil the Mind from your graveyard.
Target player mills three cards.
If Oil the Mind was cast from your graveyard, conjure a card named Fatigue and put it on top of your library. [i](It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)[/i]

Trample
When Arpechian Bellowers enters, harmonize. [i](Trigger up to one harmony of a permanent you control.)[/i]
Harmony — Search your library for a green creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

Flash
When Cocky Bladesinger enters, it gains first strike, lifelink, and haste until end of turn.

Rouse 2. Target permanent you controls fights target creature you don’t control if both are creatures. [i](Distribute two +1/+1 counters among permanents you control. If they aren’t creatures, tap them and they become 0/0 creatures in addition to their other types.)[/i]

When Scintillating Tome enters, choose a nonbasic card name.
{T}: Scry 1, then you may reveal the top card of your library. If a card with the chosen name is revealed this way, put it into your hand.
Destroy all creatures. Each player shuffles their graveyard into their library.
cards.notes: !change (wrath of god creatures instead of shuffle in creatures. indestructible and dies triggers to your hearts content.)

cards.rules_text:
Double strike
When Fencing Tutor enters, create a 0/1 white Soldier creature token with double strike.
Jara Favored gets +2/+2 as long as you’ve lost life this turn.
Whenever Cocky Delinquent is dealt damage, you gain that much life and Cocky Delinquent deals that much damage to up to one target creature or planeswalker you don’t control.

Whenever an opponent casts a spell, harmonize. [i](Trigger up to one harmony of a permanent you control.)[/i]
Harmony — Spells your opponents cast cost an additional 2 life to cast until your next turn.

Any number of target players mill twice X cards, where X is the number of artifacts and enchantments you control. Then you may cast a nonland card with mana value X or less from a graveyard without paying its mana cost. You can’t cast more spells this turn.

Haste
Whenever Eager Guide attacks, tap up to two target creatures you don’t control.

When Banishing Initiate enters, you may exile target nonland permanent you don’t control until Banishing Initiate leaves the battlefield.
At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice Banishing Initiate if a card exiled with it has mana value 3 or greater.

When Arpechian Groundskeeper enters, rouse 1. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on a permanent you control. If it isn’t a creature, tap it and it becomes a 0/0 creature in addition to its other types.)[/i]
Remove a +1/+1 counter from Arpechian Groundskeeper: Draw a card.

Exile the top two cards of your library. You may play those cards until the end of your next turn. Whenever you play one of those cards, rouse 1. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on a permanent you control. If it isn’t a creature, tap it and it becomes a 0/0 creature in addition to its other types.)[/i]

After a player chooses two or more modes while casting a spell, you may pick one of those modes. That mode is no longer chosen. [i](That player doesn’t pick targets or pay costs related to that mode. If a mode is chosen multiple times, only one instance of that mode is lost.)[/i]
cards.notes:
!pvpact
!cajun //note to self, update the modal legal check to look at the initial mode choice so Assessor doesn't just make Choose two modals uncastable

cards.rules_text:
Flying
Whenever Skyline Climber attacks, another target creature you control gains flying until end of turn.

When Recollection Revelation enters, rouse 1. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on a permanent you control. If it isn’t a creature, tap it and it becomes a 0/0 creature in addition to its other types.)[/i]
{1}{W}, Sacrifice Recollection Revelation: Return another target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

Whenever Almgrove Bladesinger attacks, harmonize. [i](Trigger up to one harmony of a permanent you control.)[/i]
Harmony — Target creature can’t block this turn.

Whenever Almgrove Spellblade attacks, harmonize. [i](Trigger up to one harmony of a permanent you control.)[/i]
Harmony — Exile the top two cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may play cards exiled by Almgrove Spellblade.

Flying
Whenever Wind Savant attacks, harmonize. [i](Trigger up to one harmony of a permanent you control.)[/i]
Harmony — Wind Savant gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

Haste
When Challenging Pupil enters, conjure a card named Fatigue and put it on top of your library. [i](It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)[/i]
{2}, Pay 2 life: Silkwrap Brawler gains indestructible until end of turn.
When Arpechian Stag enters, create a 3/3 red Elk creature token with haste, a 3/3 green Elk creature token with trample, and a 3/3 white Elk creature token with vigilance.

Counter target spell. If a noncreature spell is countered this way, conjure a card named Fatigue and put it on top of your library. [i](It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)[/i]
You gain 5 life. Then draw a card if you’ve lost life this turn.

Choose one —
• Untap each creature you control.
• Harmonize twice. [i](To harmonize, trigger up to one harmony of a permanent you control.)[/i]

Deathtouch
When Shadowed Apostle dies, draw a card.
When Expensive Tutor enters, tap target land. It doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step.

When Extracurricular Studies enters, search target opponent’s library for a card and exile it. Then that player shuffles.
You may play cards exiled by Extracurricular Studies and you may spend mana as though it was mana of any type to cast them. When you do, return Extracurricular Studies to its owner’s hand.
Shuffle your graveyard into your library, then draw two cards.

At the beginning of your upkeep, rouse 1. Then if you control a creature with power 5 or greater, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on a permanent you control. If it isn’t a creature, tap it and it becomes a 0/0 creature in addition to its other types.)[/i]

Choose one —
• Prevent all damage that would be dealt by creatures this turn.
• Harmonize twice. [i](Trigger up to one harmony of a permanent you control.)[/i]

{T}: Add {G}.
{1}{G}, {T}: Return target land card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

Whenever you cast a spell, harmonize. [i](Trigger up to one harmony of a permanent you control.)[/i]
Harmony — Gilded Duo gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

When Sending Stones enters, harmonize twice. [i](To harmonize, trigger up to one harmony of a permanent you control.)[/i]
If you would harmonize, you may trigger a harmony of a permanent card in your graveyard instead.

Whenever a player casts a spell, exile the top card of that player’s library. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it was mana of any type to cast it.
At the beginning of your end step, put all cards exiled with Endless Inspiration into their owner’s graveyards.

When Specialized Training Dummy enters, choose a card name.
Other creatures you control with the chosen name get +1/+1.

When Autumnal Resonants enters, harmonize. [i](Trigger up to one harmony of a permanent you control.)[/i]
Harmony — Create a 3/3 red and green Elemental creature token with haste.

Lifelink
Pay 3 life: Flightful Fledgling gains flying until end of turn.

If you would harmonize while this spell is on the stack, you may instead put three thunder counters on this spell.
Lightning and Thunder deals X damage to any target, where X is 3 plus the number of thunder counters on Lightning and Thunder.

For each counter on each permanent you control, you may put another counter of that kind on that permanent.
Draw a card.
Target creature gains trample and haste until end of turn. Harmonize. [i](Trigger up to one harmony of a permanent you control.)[/i]
Whenever you cast a spell, you gain 1 life for each of its colors other than white.
Search your library for a Forest or Academy card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

Reveal the top five cards of your library. For each card type, you may put a card of that type revealed this way into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard. Then you may cast a nonland card with mana value 3 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.

Festive Servitor gets +1/+1 for each color among spells you’ve cast this turn.
{2}: Add one mana of any color.
At the beginning of your upkeep, target player mills two cards. If your main library has five or fewer cards in it, that player mills their library instead.

Choose two or four —
• Each player draws seven cards.
• Each opponent discards four cards.
• Conjure three cards named Fatigue and put them on top of your library. [i](They’re colorless sorceries that cost {2} with “Draw a card.”)[/i]
• You may cast a card from your hand without paying its mana cost. Exile Capture Brilliance.

At the beginning of each combat, harmonize twice. [i](To harmonize, trigger up to one harmony of a permanent you control.)[/i]
Harmony — Target creature gets +1/+1 and your choice of flying, haste, or vigilance until end of turn.

Rouse 3. Untap target land. It gains flying and haste until end of turn if it’s a creature. [i](Distribute three +1/+1 counters among permanents you control. If they aren’t creatures, tap them and they become 0/0 creatures in addition to their other types.)[/i]

Archive 3 [i](As this enters, shuffle the top three cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)[/i]
Whenever you draw a card from the archived library, put the top card of your main library on the bottom of the archived library.
{B}: Exchange a card from the archived library with a card from your hand.
Spells you cast with mana value 4{ }{o}{r}{ }{g}{r}{e}{a}{t}{e}{r}{ }{c}{o}{s}{t}{ }1 less to cast.

Archive 3 [i](As this enters, shuffle the top three cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)[/i]
Whenever you draw a card from the archived library, put the top card of your main library on the bottom of the archived library.
{R}: Exchange a card from the archived library with a card from your hand.

Archive 3 [i](As this enters, shuffle the top three cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)[/i]
Whenever you draw a card from the archived library, put the top card of your main library on the bottom of the archived library.
{U}: Exchange a card from the archived library with a card from your hand.

When Humble Archivist enters, you may return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. If you do, conjure a card named Fatigue and put it on top of your library. [i](It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)[/i]

Reach
Whenever one or more creatures with flying attack, harmonize. [i](Trigger up to one harmony of a permanent you control.)[/i]
Harmony — Harpstring Ranger gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Untap it.

If you’ve lost life this turn, you may cast this spell as though it had flash.
Irate Retribution deals X damage to each creature and each planeswalker. You gain X life.

Whenever Starfall Instructor attacks, harmonize. [i](Trigger up to one harmony of a permanent you control.)[/i]
Harmony — Each opponent loses 2 life.

As you harmonize, you may choose another harmony ability to trigger. [i](They can’t be the same harmony.)[/i]
Harmony — Scry 1.
cards.notes: You may choose an additional harmony ability as you harmonize. (They can’t be the same harmony.)

cards.rules_text:
Target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. Its flashback cost is equal to its mana cost reduced by {2}.
Conjure a card named Fatigue and put it on top of your library. [i](It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)[/i]

!ft
!update reworked: Was {R} Sorcery, Discard your hand, then draw two cards. Conjure a Fatigue.

cards.rules_text:
Land creatures you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.
Enchantment creatures you control get +1/+1 and have lifelink.
Artifact creatures you control get +1/+1 and have flying.

If an opponent would draw one or more cards, that player instead draws that many cards plus one, then exiles a card from their hand.
You may play cards exiled by Curated Citations, and you may spend mana as though it was mana of any type to cast them.

Whenever Study Sphere or another artifact or enchantment you control enters, rouse 1. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on a permanent you control. If it isn’t a creature, tap it and it becomes a 0/0 creature in addition to its other types.)[/i]

Whenever Twilight Dancer attacks, harmonize. [i](Trigger up to one harmony of a permanent you control.)[/i]
Harmony — Each player loses 1 life and mills a card.

Rouse 2. Target permanent gains trample until end of turn if it’s a creature. [i](Distribute two +1/+1 counters among permanents you control. If they aren’t creatures, tap them and they become 0/0 creatures in addition to their other types.)[/i]

Rouse 1. Finishing Blow deals X damage to any target, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on a permanent you control. If it isn’t a creature, tap it and it becomes a 0/0 creature in addition to its other types.)[/i]

{1}, {T}: Draw a card, then exile a card from your hand face down until Cluttered Study leaves the battlefield. [i](It returns to your hand.)[/i]
{3}, {T}: Shuffle Cluttered Study into its owner’s library.

Defender
When Friend of Tides enters, rouse 2. [i](Distribute two +1/+1 counters among permanents you control. If they aren’t creatures, tap them and they become 0/0 creatures in addition to their other types.)[/i]

Lifelink
Whenever you cast a spell, harmonize. [i](Trigger up to one harmony of a permanent you control.)[/i]
Harmony — Almgrove Ensemble deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

When Speed Reader enters, harmonize. [i](Trigger up to one harmony of a permanent you control.)[/i]
Harmony — Add {R}{R}.

When Weald Wanderer enters, you gain 3 life and each opponent loses 2 life.
{1}, Pay 1 life: Shuffle Weald Wanderer into its owner’s library. If you do, draw a card.

When Thorn Tender enters, rouse 1, then put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on a permanent you control. If it isn’t a creature, tap it and it becomes a 0/0 creature in addition to its other types.)[/i]

Lands you control have hexproof.
{2}{G}{U}: Rouse 2. [i](Distribute two +1/+1 counters among permanents you control. If they aren’t creatures, tap them and they become 0/0 creatures in addition to their other types.)[/i]

When Serene Initiate enters, rouse 1. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on a permanent you control. If it isn’t a creature, tap it and it becomes a 0/0 creature in addition to its other types.)[/i]
{3}{G}{G}: Creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.
When Bestower of Blooms dies, create an X/X green Plant Knight creature token, where X is Bestower of Blooms’s power.

cards.special_text:
[+1]: For each player, exile the top three cards of that player’s library, then put one of those cards into that player’s hand.
[0]: Choose target card exiled by Rahit. Until your next turn, you may play that card, and you may spend mana as though it was mana of any type to cast it.
[-7]: Target player draws seven cards.

cards.rules_text: When Jara Disciplinarian enters, each player sacrifices a creature.

For each permanent type, choose up to one target permanent of that type. Exile each of those permanents, then return them to the battlefield under your control. They gain haste until end of turn. At the beginning of your next end step, those permanents’ owners gain control of them.

At the beginning of combat on your turn, you lose 1 life and rouse 1. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on a permanent you control. If it isn’t a creature, tap it and it becomes a 0/0 creature in addition to its other types.)[/i]

Whenever you cast a spell, harmonize. [i](Trigger up to one harmony of a permanent you control.)[/i]
Harmony — Target permanent you control becomes a 2/2 creature with flying in addition to its other types until end of turn.
When Compulsory Studies enters, exile target creature until Compulsory Studies leaves the battlefield. Each player draws a card.

When Earthcraft Meditation enters, put three +1/+1 counters on each land you control.
At the beginning of combat on each player’s turn, you may have any number of lands you control become 0/0 creatures with haste in addition to their other types until end of turn.
cards.notes: !change (moved untap from etb to combat trigger)

cards.rules_text: Destroy up to one target artifact or enchantment. Rouse 2. [i](Distribute two +1/+1 counters among permanents you control. If they aren’t creatures, tap them and they become 0/0 creatures in addition to their other types.)[/i]

Put target creature on the bottom of its owner’s library.
Each player conjures a card named Fatigue and puts it on top of their library. [i](It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)[/i]

Hexproof
You may have Glen Hunter assign its combat damage as though it weren’t blocked.

Choose one —
• Counter target creature or planeswalker spell.
• Return target creature or planeswalker to its owner’s hand.

When Dream Keeper enters, each player conjures a card named Fatigue and puts it on top of their library. [i](It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)[/i]
Whenever a player draws a card except the first one they draw in each of their draw steps, each opponent mills a card.

Rouse 2, then you gain 1 life for each creature you control. [i](Distribute two +1/+1 counters among permanents you control. If they aren’t creatures, tap them and they become 0/0 creatures in addition to their other types.)[/i]

Choose one —
• Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.
• Harmonize twice. [i](To harmonize, trigger up to one harmony of a permanent you control.)[/i]

When Distilled Inspiration enters, draw a card, then choose a card name.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a spell with the chosen name or activate an ability of a card with the chosen name.
Scry 1, then you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile a card from your hand with a knowledge counter on it. If you do, draw a card. Then you may have Professor Adelia become a copy of any permanent card you own in exile with a knowledge counter on it, except it has this ability.
Whenever Professor’s Assistant becomes tapped, add {R}. Until end of turn, you don’t lose this mana as steps and phases end.

This spell can’t be countered.
Exile your library, then shuffle Revisionary Studies, your graveyard, and your hand into your library. Draw five cards.
Rouse 4. [i](Distribute four +1/+1 counters among permanents you control. If they aren’t creatures, tap them and they become 0/0 creatures in addition to their other types.)[/i]

Choose two or four —
• Return target nonland permanent to its owner’s hand.
• Each player sacrifices a creature.
• Each player sacrifices a noncreature, nonland permanent.
• Conjure a card named Fatigue and put it on top of your library. [i](It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)[/i]

Lifelink
At the beginning of each player’s end step, that player discards each card in their hand, then draws that many cards. When no cards are discarded this way, Dayang, Aspiring Muse deals 2 damage to each opponent.
For each creature you control, create a token that’s a copy of it. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step.

When Compose from Dreams enters, you may cast any number of cards named Fatigue from your hand and graveyard without paying their mana costs.
Whenever you cast a spell, each opponent loses 1 life. Then you may draw a card if that spell wasn’t cast from your hand. Then add {U}{B}{R} if you don’t own that spell.

Choose two or four —
• Search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
• Each player mills seven cards.
• You gain 1 life for each land card in your graveyard.
• Conjure a card named Fatigue and put it on top of your library. [i](It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)[/i]

Whenever you cast a spell, harmonize twice. [i](To harmonize, trigger up to one harmony of a permanent you control.)[/i]
Harmony — Yita, Almgrove Prodigy gains your choice of flying, first strike, vigilance, lifelink, hexproof, or haste until end of turn.

When Almgrove Performer enters, harmonize. [i](Trigger up to one harmony of a permanent you control.)[/i]
Harmony — You gain 3 life.

When Chaotic Pupil enters, harmonize twice. [i](To harmonize, trigger up to one harmony of a permanent you control.)[/i]
Harmony — Draw a card, then discard a card.

Sacrifice a creature: Harmonize. [i](Trigger up to one harmony of a permanent you control.)[/i]
Harmony — Look at the top two cards of your library. Put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest back on top in any order.

Choose one —
• Target permanent gains protection from instants and sorceries until end of turn.
• You gain 3 life.
• Draw a card.

Once each turn, when a player loses life, you may harmonize. [i](Trigger up to one harmony of a permanent you control.)[/i]
Harmony — Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.

If you’ve lost life this turn, you may cast this spell as though it had flash.
Return X target cards with different mana values from your graveyard to your hand. Put Studies Past on the bottom of its owner’s library.

Rouse 4. Sacrifice a creature at the beginning of the next end step. [i](Distribute four +1/+1 counters among permanents you control. If they aren’t creatures, tap them and they become 0/0 creatures in addition to their other types.)[/i]

Flourishing Forest enters tapped.
As Flourishing Forest enters, choose a basic land type.
Flourishing Forest is the chosen type in addition to its other types.

Flourishing Island enters tapped.
As Flourishing Island enters, choose a basic land type.
Flourishing Island is the chosen type in addition to its other types.

Flourishing Plains enters tapped.
As Flourishing Plains enters, choose a basic land type.
Flourishing Plains is the chosen type in addition to its other types.

Flourishing Swamp enters tapped.
As Flourishing Swamp enters, choose a basic land type.
Flourishing Swamp is the chosen type in addition to its other types.

Flourishing Mountain enters tapped.
As Flourishing Mountain enters, choose a basic land type.
Flourishing Mountain is the chosen type in addition to its other types.

cards.special_text:
[+1]: Search your library for a land card, put it onto the battlefield, untap it, then shuffle. Sacrifice a land.
[-2]: Destroy target noncreature permanent. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
[-6]: Return any number of land cards from your graveyard to the battlefield and untap them. They become 3/3 creatures with haste in addition to their other types.
